name: init
desc: Initializes an instance of a stereo pan control.
declaration: virtual bool init(IOUserAudioDriver *in_driver, bool in_is_settable, float in_control_value, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioObjectPropertyElement in_left_channel, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioObjectPropertyElement in_right_channel, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioObjectPropertyElement in_control_element, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioObjectPropertyScope in_control_scope, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioClassID in_control_class_id);
